EmailTemplate.subject: BSG Bus Schedule Update.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please be aware that the most up-to-date bus schedule is now available on the school website.
Kindly note that changes have been made to some pick up and drop off times/locations and bus monitors' contact details have been adjusted after further trials this week.
For the full schedule, please refer to the website (www.bsg.org.cn) or click here for more information.
Also, a reminder that the school day starts at 8:00 am from 20th August and there are no After School Activities (ASAs) for the first two weeks of term so school will finish at 3pm each day.
Many thanks for your understanding and support.
Kind regards,
Grace Kwan Bus Coordinator The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education _________________________________________________________ Member of The British Schools Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International School of South East Asia - Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
